title: The Sealed Nectar
author: Safi-ur-Rahman al-Mubarakpuri
description: Award-winning biography of Prophet Muhammad (peace be upon him), tracing key events with reliable references and clear storytelling.

title: Fortress of the Muslim
author: Saeed bin Ali al-Qahtani
description: Essential daily supplications from the Qur'an and Sunnah, arranged by life situations for practical use.

title: Riyad-us-Saliheen
author: Imam An-Nawawi
description: Classic collection of hadiths covering worship, manners, ethics, and spiritual refinement.

title: Stories of the Prophets
author: Ibn Kathir
description: Narrative account of prophets mentioned in Islamic sources, with lessons for modern readers.

title: Tafsir Ibn Kathir (Vol. 1)
author: Ibn Kathir
description: Foundational Qur'an commentary based on authentic reports, linguistic precision, and early scholarship.

title: Fiqh-us-Sunnah
author: Sayyid Sabiq
description: Accessible jurisprudence handbook with evidence-based discussion for everyday practice.

title: When the Moon Split
author: Safi-ur-Rahman al-Mubarakpuri
description: Concise and engaging seerah for younger and general readers with practical reflections.

title: The Qur'an (Translation)
author: Sahih International
description: Clear English translation suitable for daily reading, study circles, and first-time learners.
